text: Vony takozh skazaly, "Shcho ye u shlunkakh tsiyeyi domashnoyi khudoby rezervuyet聞sya vyklyuchno dlya muzhchyn sered nas, ta zaboronyayet聞sya dlya nashykh zhinok." Ale yakshcho tse bulo vse shche narodzhennya, vony dozvolyly yikhnim zhinkam podilyty tam. Vin bude zvychayno requite yim dlya yikhnikh novovveden聞. Vin ye Naybil聞sh Mudryy, Omniscient
